id: scenario-value-scanner-parent-scenarios-workplace-organizational-workplace emotional labor while managing parenting stress
title: Workplace emotional labor while managing parenting stress
description: Workplace emotional labor while managing parenting stress
content:
Scenario: Workplace emotional labor while managing parenting stress
    Given Sarah performs emotional labor with students and colleagues
    And she's also managing intense parenting emotional demands
    When the workplace_elohim tracks total emotional labor
    Then it should recognize dual emotional work burden
    And it should flag when emotional demands are unsustainable
    And it should recognize that parents carry compounded emotional labor
    And the system should help Sarah manage total emotional load
    And workplace should understand parents' emotional labor reality
    And Sarah's complete emotional work should be visible and valued
